#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pi;

#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define MOD 1000000007
#define INF (1 << 30)

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t, n, m, i, a, b;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n >> m;
		for(i = 0; i < m; i++)
			cin >> a >> b;
		cout << (1LL * n * n)/4 - m << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
